mapper.select: SELECT a.product_id as productId, a.product_category_id as productCategoryId, a.name as name, a.price as price, a.description as description, a.weight as weight FROM product a, product_branch_office b, branch_office c WHERE c.id_branch_office = b.branch_office_id_branch_office AND b.product_product_id = a.product_id AND c.id_branch_office = #{idbranch}

SELECT a.product_id as productId, a.name as name, a.price as price, (SELECT c.percentage FROM offers_register c WHERE a.product_id = c.product_product_id AND c.status=1 ORDER BY c.id_offers DESC LIMIT 1) as percentage, a.description as description, (SELECT d.name FROM product_category d WHERE d.id = a.product_id) as category, (SELECT e.photo FROM media_product e WHERE a.product_id = e.product_product_id ORDER BY e.media_id DESC LIMIT 1) as firstImage
FROM product a join product_branch_office b on a.product_id = b.product_product_id WHERE b.branch_office_id_branch_office = #{idbranch} AND a.status = 1

SELECT a.product_id as productId, a.name as name, a.price as price, (SELECT c.percentage FROM offers_register c WHERE a.product_id = c.product_product_id AND c.status=1 ORDER BY c.id_offers DESC LIMIT 1) as percentage, a.description as description, (SELECT d.name FROM product_category d WHERE d.id = a.product_id) as category, (SELECT e.photo FROM media_product e WHERE a.product_id = e.product_product_id ORDER BY e.media_id DESC LIMIT 1) as firstImage
FROM product a join product_branch_office b on a.product_id = b.product_product_id WHERE b.branch_office_id_branch_office = #{idbranch} AND a.status = 1 AND a.product_category_id = #{idcategory}

SELECT product_id as productId, name as name, price as price, (SELECT c.percentage FROM offers_register c WHERE c.product_product_id=#{productid} AND c.status=1 ORDER BY c.id_offers DESC LIMIT 1) as percentage, description as description, (SELECT a.id.product_branchoffice FROM product_branch_office a WHERE a.product_product_id=#{productid}) as branchId FROM product WHERE product_id = #{productid}
